attributes.additional_details:
Micronations have been around for hundreds of years, and are important part the UK economy. They provide trade the the rest of the UK through purchasing of resources, and often promote certain branches of our culture, such as music.

I, James Rawlinson, believe that all micronations should be recognised in their own right as states, like in the USA, and have the right to write their own laws within their vicinity.

Sign NOW to show your support!
